# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- When showing condition results in the console, write output in red if the result is false.
- Tasks should run immediately at program start, then subsequent runs scheduled according to configuration.
- Store last condition evaluation result per configured task and raise a warning when it changes according to the task's WarnWhen setting (becomesTrue, becomesFalse, changes).

## Code Style
- Use specific formatting rules
- Follow naming conventions

## Project-Specific Rules
- Custom requirement A
- Custom requirement B
